Perceptor/Nightlight::

"WHAT THE HELL!!!!" shouted Perceptor while he ran towards the 
exit "Blackstorm... STAY HER AND DON'T LEAVE THE BASE IT'S A 
COMMAND!!!"

Blackstorm was disgusted... She desired start to fight
